name: Green Inc.
description:

Hello, this is Vittorio (aka SirPryderi) here!

Meet Green Inc., the game I am developing as my honours project.

The game is still a proof of concept, but it already lets you explore the effects that CO2 has on a small, adorable and low-poly world. 

The project is being developed in Unity3D and the source code is freely available on GitHub (https://github.com/SirPryderi/green-inc).

If you like the idea of the game, and you'd like to see this happening, please let me know. I definitely need all the motivation I can get, or I'll let this project slide in the big pile of things I begun and then forgot about. That reminds me I should do laundry.

Anyways, comments, recommandations and thrown tomatoes are welcome!
